mapper.select: SELECT b.board_id AS boardId, b.students_id AS studentsId, s.students_name AS studentsName, title, content, IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(b.update_at,'%Y-%m-%d'), '-') AS updateAt, DATE_FORMAT(b.create_at,'%Y-%m-%d') AS createAt, cnt FROM board b inner join students s ON b.students_id = s.students_id LIMIT #{pageNum},#{pageSize}

SELECT b.board_id AS boardId, b.students_id AS studentsId, s.students_name AS studentsName, title, content, IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(b.update_at,'%Y-%m-%d'), '-') AS updateAt, DATE_FORMAT(b.create_at,'%Y-%m-%d') AS createAt, cnt FROM board b inner join students s on b.students_id = s.students_id
SELECT COUNT(*) AS boardCnt FROM board AS b INNER JOIN students AS s ON b.students_id = s.students_id
SELECT title, content, create_at, cnt FROM board WHERE board_id = #{id}

SELECT b.board_id AS boardId, b.students_id AS studentsId, s.students_name AS studentsName, title, content, IFNULL(DATE_FORMAT(b.update_at,'%Y-%m-%d'), '-') AS updateAt, DATE_FORMAT(b.create_at,'%Y-%m-%d') AS createAt, b.cnt AS cnt FROM board b inner join students s on b.students_id = s.students_id WHERE s.students_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{studentsName},'%')

select count(*) as studentsCnt, ( select count(*) from board ) as boardCnt, ( select count(distinct(b.students_id)) from students as s inner join board as b on s.students_id = b.students_id ) as writerCnt, ( select sum(cnt) from board ) as viewsCnt from students
